events.name: Shelley hard fork
events.description: The main objectives of the Shelley upgrade were to increase network decentralization, enhance security, and enable stakeholder participation through staking and delegation.

events.name: Mary hard fork
events.description: With the Mary upgrade, the blockchain became capable of hosting and handling native assets on its network.

events.name: Alonzo hard fork
events.description: The upgrade was named after Alonzo Church, a renowned logician and mathematician. It introduced the Plutus platform v1.0, which is a smart contract development platform.

events.name: Vasil hard fork
events.description: The upgrade enhances Cardano's smart contract capabilities through Plutus v2. The main additions that Vasil unlocks are: Reference inputs (CIP 31), Inline datums (CIP-32), Reference scripts (CIP-33), Datums and redeemers, Data Serialisation primitive (CIP 42)

events.name: Poll experiment (ballot casts)
events.description: Cardano Foundation's poll experiment empowered stake pool operators to actively participate in decentralized governance. They played a crucial role in voting on key parameters of the Cardano blockchain.

events.name: Poll experiment (re-delegation)
events.description: During the re-delegation phase, users were given the chance to make use of the ADA they owned as stake. By delegating their ADA to a stake pool, they guaranteed that the amount they delegated would contribute to the overall voting power of that pool. This meant that the more ADA users delegated to the pool, the more weight it carried in the voting process.

events.name: Poll experiment (snapshot)
events.description: In the end of the Cardano Foundation's poll experiment, the foundation will snapshot the stake delegated to the stake pools and draft a report of the voting.

recurring.name: Town Hall Meeting
recurring.description:
Join Project Catalyst team and community for our weekly town hall followed by an open space with break out rooms.

Registration

events.name: Fund 10 – Results
events.description:
Community participation in this fund has surpassed expectations, with a total number of recorded votes in Fund10 reaching almost 410k votes cast, which is over 45k more votes received than in Fund9, an increase of 12.5% and bringing the total number of votes Catalyst has received close to 2,2 million votes!

You can view the Fund10 Stats and download a full breakdown of the results here

The numbers continue to grow and demonstrate that the community is making its voice heard on what they want to see on Cardano.

recurring.name: Leaderlogs for next epoch
recurring.description: As a stake pool operator, it is possible to run queries to determine whether your pool is scheduled to mint blocks. Leaderlog information for the next epoch is available within 1.5 days from the end of the current epoch.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023, Dubai
events.description:
The global Cardano event returns, bringing together industry leaders, businesses, and blockchain enthusiasts. It’s a hub to network and connect with a new generation of innovative projects.

In Dubai, attendees will enjoy not only thought-provoking discussions, masterclasses, and a fresh round of Cardano Summit Awards, but also a desert experience, hackathon, shark tank, and much more.

Tickets

The Cardano Summit brings together some of the brightest minds in blockchain. It’s a global celebration to learn, network, and collaborate with those leveraging Cardano to build the future around the world. Register for the events you will be attending.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Amsterdam Community)
events.description: For the third year in a row, experienced host Max von Rossem will organize the Amsterdam event, welcoming the community to join an exciting session. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Bangalore Community)
events.description: At the Bangalore event, the Nucast team will welcome the Indian community for an enjoyable evening of discussions and networking opportunities. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Bangkok Community)
events.description: Amidst the educational environment of the Srinakharinwirot University in Bangkok, Metinee Boonrattanaamorn will receive the Thai Cardano community for an afternoon of learning and networking. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Buenos Aires Community)
events.description: Jose Iadicicco, hosting the Buenos Aires event for the third year in a row, will bring the wide Argentinian community together for a day of lively discussions and conversations. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Cape Town Community)
events.description: Happening a few days before the main stage event in Dubai, the Cape Town event will take place at the recently opened Cardano Center and welcome everyone to a day of thrilling conversations. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Curitiba Community)
events.description: Two weeks after the main stage event in Dubai, Cardano Ambassador Thiago Nunes will host the Curitiba event and offer the Brazilian community a second chance to network and debate. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Düsseldorf Community)
events.description: Organized by the IAMX team, the Düsseldorf event will focus on building bridges between traditional businesses and the Cardano ecosystem.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Hanoi Community)
events.description: Organized by Cardano Ambassador and stake pool operator Tien Nguyen Anh, the Hanoi event will start early in the morning and last the majority of the day. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Ho Chi Minh City Community)
events.description: Mie Tran, Cardano Ambassador and Reddit moderator, will welcome all blockchain enthusiasts to the Ho Chi Minh event, which will begin in the early hours of the day. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Jakarta Community)
events.description: Fanny Wijaya will host the Jakarta event, giving the Indonesian community a full day of memorable moments and networking opportunities. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Kinshasa Community)
events.description: Hosted by Dan Baruka, founder of the group Uptodate Developers, the Kinshasa event will be held in French, offering the French-speaking Cardano community an opportunity to connect and network. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Kumasi Community)
events.description: Cardano Ambassadors Mohammed Mustapha Yakubu and Jeremiah Baani will bring together the Ghanaian community and welcome all blockchain enthusiasts as well as anyone curious about new technologies. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (London Community)
events.description: The Upstream Stake Pool team will welcome all blockchain enthusiasts to the London event for an afternoon of enjoyable conversations and discussions. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Los Angeles Community)
events.description: Stake pool operators Nadeem Ahmed and Christian Hercules will welcome the Los Angeles Cardano community to an evening looking to highlight local projects and initiatives. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Mexico City Community)
events.description: Two days before the main stage event in Dubai, Enrique Guasp will receive the Mexican community for an afternoon of networking and engaging conversations. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Miami Community)
events.description: Hosted by Cardano Ambassador Hassan Michael, the Miami event will provide educational content, business development mini-seminars, and networking opportunities, as well as a watch party. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (New York City Community)
events.description: In cosmopolitan New York, Cardano Ambassador Mototsugu Oba will host an event focused on development on Cardano, giving all attendees several opportunities to debate and network. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Oslo Community)
events.description: Thomas Lindseth of Krypto Labs will host the Oslo event, which will happen a few days after the main stage event in Dubai. Keeping with the latest discussions, the Oslo event will focus on governance. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (San Antonio Community)
events.description: Beau Block will host the San Antonio event, starting with a watch party on 3 November and a full day of discussions and networking on 4 November. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Seoul Community)
events.description: Oscar Hong, Cardano Ambassador and often community educator, will host the Seoul event, with a particular emphasis on the latest developments on Cardano. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Tokyo Community)
events.description: In vibrant Tokyo, Cardano Ambassador YUTA, will welcome the Japanese blockchain enthusiasts to an evening full of exciting discussions. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Vancouver Community)
events.description: A week after the main stage event in Dubai, long-time participant in Project Catalyst Nori Nishigaya will give the Canadian community another opportunity to get together and discuss the latest in Cardano. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Cardano Summit 2023 (Vienna Community)
events.description: Elias Ring and Simon Fleck will host the Vienna event a week after the main stage event in Dubai. The Vienna event looks to showcase the unique projects being developed by the local community. NFT ticketing sent closer to event.

events.name: Crypto 2023
events.description:
The Crypto conference is an international conference on all aspects of cryptology. The Crypto conference has been held every year since 1981 in Santa Barbara, California, USA.

Crypto 2023 is the 43rd International Cryptology Conference and will take place in Santa Barbara, USA on August 19-24, 2023. The academic program covers all aspects of cryptology. Crypto 2023 is organized by the International Association for Cryptologic Research (IACR).

events.name: Asiacrypt 2023
events.description: The Asiacrypt conference is an international conference on all aspects of cryptology. The Asiacrypt conference has been sponsored by IACR since 2000, and it is now held annually in a different venue in the Asia-Pacific region.

events.name: Eurocrypt 2023
events.description: The Eurocrypt conference is an international conference on all aspects of cryptology. The Eurocrypt conference has been held every year since 1987, and is held in a different location in Europe every year.

events.name: Eurocrypt 2024
events.description: The Eurocrypt conference is an international conference on all aspects of cryptology. The Eurocrypt conference has been held every year since 1987, and is held in a different location in Europe every year.

events.name: Rare Evo 2023
events.description:
Rare Evo is a blockchain convention welcoming multi-chain projects, communities, industry leaders, investors, and enthusiasts to network, educate, and celebrate around the theme of interoperability and the convergence of traditional industry with Web3 technology. Our audience and programming cover all verticles of the space alongside an inclusive blockchain agnostic approach. The event offers a variety of networking opportunities and entertainment options daily and nightly through the course of a long weekend.

Beyond the expo hall, where blockchain professionals can network and gain brand exposure, education awaits in our main stage auditorium, hosting leaders of the space in panels, fireside chats, and keynote speeches. Our breakout rooms which contain workshops, hackathons, lectures, and shared co-working space, offer an intimate and collaborative setting throughout the event.

Attendees can take a break from business anytime and enjoy interactive experiences, such as art installations, web3/traditional gaming tournaments, three separate after party opportunities stacked with live entertainment, and a wide variety of dining options and resort amenities. VIP ticket holders will receive hot breakfast, lunch, and hors d'oeuvres alongside drink tickets conveniently within the event space, while GA can enjoy a wide selection of onsite dining options throughout the greater venue areas.

Thursday will consist of Industry day, including booth build out followed by an exclusive kick-off party for sponsors, VIP ticket holders, and exhibitor teams. Friday and Saturday will provide two full days of exhibition and programming, followed by after parties each night for all attendees. Rare Evo is hosted at a family and kid friendly venue with plenty of options for the whole crew to stay busy while certain members dedicate their attention to the event itself.

events.name: Futurist Conference 2022
events.description:
Untraceable’s 4th annual Futurist Conference is the largest blockchain and emerging technologies event in Canada.

The event brings together leading experts from around the globe including developers, investors, startups, enterprise leaders, financial institutions, academics and emerging tech pioneers. World class thought leaders in Blockchain, Crypto, DeFi, AI, Gaming, FinTech, Privacy and other areas will discuss upcoming trends, new tech, partnerships, research and predictions within future defining sectors.

events.name: Futurist Conference 2023
events.description:
Blockchain Futurist Conference is returning for its 5th year on August 15 & 16, 2023 in Toronto, Canada at Rebel Entertainment Complex and Cabana.

The conference focuses on exploring the future potential and direction of blockchain technology by bringing together the greatest minds of Web3, crypto, metaverse, DeFi, GameFi, NFTs, DAOs, and more Designed as a fully immersive crypto experience with crypto powered marketplaces, NFT Galleries, Crypto ATMs, and blockchain technology used throughout the event.

events.name: Coinfest Asia 2023 - Bali
events.description: Explore real-world insights and valuable connections in Web2.5 where web2 and web3 industries converge through an immersive festival experience.

events.name: The Science of Blockchain Conference 2023
events.description:
The conference focuses on technical innovations in the blockchain ecosystem, and brings together researchers and practioners working in the space. We are interested in the application of cryptography, decentralized protocols, formal methods, and empirical analysis, to improving the security and scalability of blockchain deployments. We aim to foster collaboration among practitioners and researchers working on blockchain protocol development, cryptography, distributed systems, secure computing, crypto-economics, and economic risk analysis.

The conference is co-organized by the Stanford Center for Blockchain Research (CBR), IC3, and Berkeley RDI.

Venue: Arrillaga Alumni Center (326 Galvez St), Stanford University. Map.

events.name: Permissionless 2023
events.description:
Permissionless II is the world’s largest DeFi event.

Join 7000+ crypto enthusiasts and builders September 11-13th at the Austin Convention Center in Austin, TX.

This 3 day experience is filled with keynotes from Web3 leaders and thoughtfully curated panels, networking events, unforgettable parties, activations, and so much more.

events.name: European Blockchain Convention 9
events.description:
European Blockchain Convention was born with the mission to accelerate the blockchain ecosystem in Europe.

Since its inaugural conference in 2018 in Barcelona, EBC has hosted thousands of attendees, hundreds of leading speakers and the best startups in the blockchain & crypto space.

Its global audience of founders, investors, regulators, developers, corporations, and many more come together every year to learn, get inspired, and connect.

events.name: Nordic Blockchain Conference Copenhagen
events.description: Nordic Blockchain Conference (NBC) unites the largest web3 network in the nordics with the global community. This year on September 6 + 7, where we bring together industry experts, thought leaders, educators, and professionals from around the world to explore the limitless potential of the web3 space.

events.name: TOKEN 2049 Singapore
events.description:
TOKEN2049 is the premier crypto event, organised annually in Singapore, where founders and executives of the leading Web3 companies and projects share their view on the industry. We shine a light on the global developments, while taking a unique and widening perspective on the ecosystem and its vast opportunities.

​TOKEN2049 brings together the global Web3 industry, uniting entrepreneurs, investors, developers, industry insiders and global media - and creates unparalleled networking opportunities.

TOKEN2049 draws the most influential figures, projects and companies, spawning hundreds of meetups, workshops, and networking opportunities all around the two-day main event.

On 13-14 September 2023, TOKEN2049 will be the distinguished flagship event of TOKEN2049 Week, which features a week of various independently organised side events around TOKEN2049. Expect a wide range of meetups, workshops, hackathons, networking drinks, parties and Formula 1 Racing.

Singapore will be transformed into a vibrant crypto hub.

events.name: WTO Public Forum - It is time for action
events.description:
The 2023 Public Forum will examine how trade can contribute to a greener and more sustainable future. The Forum will explore how trade can facilitate access to environmental goods, services and technologies, help achieving the Paris Agreement's Nationally Determined Contributions, and maintain the ambition to limit global warming to 1.5 degrees above pre-industrial levels.

The Forum has three subthemes:

  • The role of the services sector in sustainable trade
  • Inclusive policies for the advancement of green trade
  • Digitalisation as a tool for the greening of supply chains

events.name: Blockchain Economy Dubai Summit
events.description: Blockchain Economy Summit is the world's largest blockchain conference network bringing together the key players of crypto industry and experts to redefine the future of finance. The 8th edition of the Blockchain Economy Summit will take place during two days in Dubai on October 4-5, 2023 with the world's top crypto companies, blockchain entrepreneurs and AI innovators. Today, UAE, specifically Dubai is gearing up to become a global crypto hub, also embracing the AI technologies to boost efficiency and implementation across public services. Thus, Blockchain Economy Dubai Summit will be the Main gathering in the region on behalf of the world of blockchain, cryptocurrency and AI technologies, with a wide range of topics focused on the revolutional technologies of the future, extensive networking opportunities and participation from more than 85 countries.

events.name: Dcentral Tokyo
events.description:
DCENTRAL Tokyo is our first dedicated Web3 conference in Japan and starts our journey into Asia.

Held after Token2049 and right before Tokyo Game Show on September 19 and 20th in the heart of Shibuya, we partner with Web3BB Tokyo, one of the largest and most established Web3 communities builders and connectors in Japan.

Earlier this year, Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party’s Web3 project team approved a whitepaper laying out recommendations for growing the country’s cryptocurrency industry, which has become part of the national strategy under Prime Minister Fumio Kishida’s administration.

Our goal is to bridge Japan and the world by providing a platform and bringing together people to learn and discuss the core ideas of Web3. E xpect major Japanese brands and key Web3 speakers from around the world to join us.

Featuring the best of NFTs, Gaming, Metaverses, DAOs and Web3 from around the world, DCENTRAL Tokyo will be an intimate gathering featuring curated keynotes and panel discussions, seminars, and networking that offers the latest of what's currently happening at the forefront of Web3.

events.name: State of Crypto: Policy and Regulation
events.description:
State of Crypto: Policy and Regulation is a one-day boutique event for 250 people that unites key policymakers, regulators and government officials with legal, policy and compliance executives representing the largest and most influential TradFi and DeFi leaders in asset management and financial services. This event is for GCs, CCOs, CLOs, COOs, heads of policy and government affairs who are evaluating or actively investing in digital assets.

The industry will meet to set industry standards and align on practical short-term and long-term objectives through pointed conversations with the best legal minds and Washington D.C.’s most important decision makers. The gathering provides an unprecedented opportunity to evaluate, dissect and ultimately shape crypto regulatory frameworks that support a vibrant, secure and healthy future for the digital economy.

Agenda

The State of Crypto: Policy and Regulation agenda will be updated frequently in the coming weeks. This one-day event consists of:

  • Plenary sessions featuring key policymakers, regulators, government officials and the most influential leaders in asset management and financial services
  • Breakout sessions for participants to connect with industry experts and their peers to discuss and dissect the most pressing digital assets' regulatory, compliance and policy challenges
  • Interactive networking breaks and a post-conference cocktail reception to continue the important conversations taking place throughout the day

events.name: Blockchain Expo North America
events.description:
The Blockchain Expo will take place on June 5-6 2024 at the Santa Clara Convention Center, CA.

This technology event is for the ambitious Blockchain enthusiast, seeking to explore the latest innovations, implementations and strategies within Blockchain Technology. Network with other attendees, exhibitors and sponsors and discover how to drive forward your business for 2024 and beyond.

Don’t miss the opportunity to explore this innovative technology and its impact on a range of industries including; manufacturing, transport, supply chain, government, financial services, energy, insurance, healthcare, retail and more!

Over 7,000 attendees are expected to join from across the globe including CTOs, Heads of Innovation and Technology, IT Directors, Telecom Providers, Developers, Start-Ups, OEMs, Government, Automotive, Operators, Technology Providers, Investors, VCs and many more.

The Expo will provide insight from over 250 speakers sharing their unparalleled industry knowledge and real-life experiences in the forms of solo presentations, expert panel discussions and in-depth fireside chats.

events.name: Blockchain Expo Europe
events.description:
The world-leading Blockchain Expo series will arrive at the RAI, Amsterdam on 26-27 September 2023 to host its 7th annual event.

The Expo features keynote speakers, panel discussions, and workshops conducted by industry experts. These sessions can help you gain insights into the latest trends, developments, and use cases in the blockchain space.

Network with like-minded individuals, industry leaders, investors, and potential partners.

The Expo will bring together key industries from across the globe for two days of top-level content and discussion across 6 co-located events covering Blockchain, IoT, Cyber Security & Cloud, AI and Big data, Edge Computing and Digital Transformation.

This event is part of TechEx Europe, which covers IoT, AI & Big Data, Digital Transformation, and Cyber Security & Cloud, so you can learn a variety of key enterprise technology solutions all in one place, under one roof.

events.name: Blockchain Expo Gobal
events.description:
The world-leading Blockchain Expo series will arrive at the London Olympia on 30th November – 1st December 2023 to host its seventh annual Global event.

Join us to discover what leading Blockchain companies are offering, learn more about the industry’s current state and where it is going in the future.

This technology event is for the ambitious Blockchain enthusiast, seeking to explore the latest innovations, implementations and strategies within Blockchain Technology.

It will bring together key industries from across the globe for two days of top-level content and discussion across 6 co-located events with IoT (Co-Locating 5G), AI & Big Data, Cyber Security & Cloud, Edge Computing and Digital Transformation Week

6,000 attendees are expected to congregate for the event including CTOs, Heads of Innovation and Technology, IT Directors, Developers, Start-Ups, OEMs, Government, Automotive, Operators, Technology Providers, Investors, VCs and many more.

The Blockchain Expo will showcase the most cutting-edge technologies from more than 200 exhibitors and provide insight from over 150 speakers sharing their unparalleled industry knowledge and real-life experiences.
